/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. On the left side of the street, modern skyscrapers reach towards the sky, their glass and steel facades reflecting the sunlight. In contrast, the right side of the street is adorned with older buildings, their brick and concrete structures adding a touch of history and charm to the scene. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along it, and pedestrians going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the image. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape.
